meanings: (목적) goal, aim, target, purpose, (사업·업무 등의) objective

vlive.korean: 빗... 올해 목표! Comb... My goal this year! 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
올해 목표야? 활동 목표 아니야? This year? Isn't it for this promotion? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: This year? Isn't it for this promotion?

vlive.korean: 아 그 목표가 올해 목표도 적는 건가? When you say goal, is it for this year? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: When you say goal, is it for this year?

vlive.korean: 목표를 쓰는 거야? - 뭘 하면 좋을까요? Are we writing down the goal? - What should I write? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Are we writing down the goal? - What should I write?

vlive.korean: 이쯤 오니까 목표랑 각오 이런 거 물어봤을 때 - 목포요? at this point, when I'm asked about my goal, - Gold? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: at this point, when I'm asked about my goal, - Gold?

examples.korean: the deflection of the missile away from its target 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미사일이 목표물을 벗어난 편차 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We aim to help the poorest families. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 가장 빈곤한 가정을 돕는 것을 목표로 하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We aim to help the poorest families. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Teamwork is required in order to achieve these aims. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이들 목표를 달성하려면 팀워크가 요구된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Teamwork is required in order to achieve these aims. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our aim is immediacy of response to emergency calls. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 목표는 긴급 호출에 신속하게 반응하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our aim is immediacy of response to emergency calls. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is never too late to reformulate your goals. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자신의 목표를 재설정하는 것은 언제 해도 결코 너무 늦지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is never too late to reformulate your goals. Add to Wordbook
